LanguageData.Jailbreaker.label: !!inducing prisoner to escape
LanguageData.Jailbreaker.beginLetter: {0} has a mental breakdown and is going to induce prisoners to escape.
LanguageData.Jailbreaker.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer inducing prisoners to escape.
LanguageData.Slaughterer.label: slaughterer
LanguageData.Slaughterer.beginLetter: {0} has a mental breakdown and is going to vent HIS anger on your animals.
LanguageData.Slaughterer.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer slaughtering random animals.
LanguageData.MurderousRage.label: murderous rage
LanguageData.MurderousRage.beginLetter: {0} is in a murderous rage. HECAP is going to kill {1}.
LanguageData.MurderousRage.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer in a murderous rage.

LanguageData.Tantrum.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer having a tantrum.

LanguageData.TargetedTantrum.beginLetter: {0} is having a tantrum. HECAP is going to destroy {1}.
LanguageData.TargetedTantrum.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer having a tantrum.
LanguageData.BedroomTantrum.label: tantrum
LanguageData.BedroomTantrum.beginLetter: {0} is having a tantrum. HECAP is going to smash furniture in HIS room.
LanguageData.BedroomTantrum.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer having a tantrum.
LanguageData.SadisticRage.label: sadistic rage
LanguageData.SadisticRage.beginLetter: {0} is in a sadistic rage. HECAP is going to vent HIS anger on the prisoners.
LanguageData.SadisticRage.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer in a sadistic rage.
LanguageData.CorpseObsession.label: corpse obsession
LanguageData.CorpseObsession.beginLetter: {0} is having a corpse obsession. HECAP is going to dig up a corpse.
LanguageData.CorpseObsession.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer having a corpse obsession.
